title: electronica mix + soul house +  soundtrack 4x2hr [TMBK 3] bbc
description:
More of the latest musical shockers from Giles Peterson in last weeks BBC Radio 1 show.

Electronic, hip-hop, rock, jazz, house, funk, indie, soul, sountack, rnb and more.



3 sessions each lasting 2hrs from GP
1 session from Mary Anne Hobb&#039;s show on bbc radio 1

Guest spots from plantlife and a mindblowing dance mix from peverlist and 2562.

Check Plantlifes take on J Dilla, Q-tip, Madlib and Alicia Keys.



Thank you the BBC :)

TMBK: Always =256kbps= + =MP3=

Full tracklists are included in the files.
